cof_goals.KPI: 3Bs Initiative - Number of individual actions reflecting desired behaviors - Passionate innovation, Boldly Efficient and Proactive Collaboration
cof_goals.Target: 3Bs Initiative - any 1 of the 3Bs in the four monthly review (minimum two behaviours shall be evidenced over the year, out of which minimum one behaviour of Passionate Innovation)

cof_goals.KPI: KPI to be as per KRA which is performed or controlled by employee to achieve Safety targets
cof_goals.Target: Safety Target (Please coordinate with Health & Safety Team for target relevant to your department)

bce.INDICATORS: Finds opportunities inherent even in uncertain situations and guides the organization to capitalize on them.
bce.COMP_DEF: OPERATING EFFECTIVELY, EVEN WHEN THINGS ARE NOT CERTAIN OR THE WAY FORWARD IS NOT CLEAR.

bce.INDICATORS: Builds a culture of collaboration and teamwork among multiple stakeholders and leads conflict resolution constructively.
bce.COMP_DEF: BUILDING PARTNERSHIPS AND WORKING COLLABORATIVELY WITH OTHERS TO MEET SHARED OBJECTIVES.

bce.INDICATORS: Builds a leadership team that drives the goals and success of HMEL in a way to strengthen collaborative working
bce.COMP_DEF: DEVELOPING SELF AND BUILDING CAPABLE TEAMS THAT APPLY THEIR SKILLS AND PERSPECTIVES TO ACHIEVE COMMON GOALS.

bce.INDICATORS: Develops and integrates HMEL strategies and explores future possibilities to achieve and sustain competitive advantage.
bce.COMP_DEF: SEEING AHEAD TO FUTURE POSSIBILITIES AND TRANSLATING THEM INTO BREAKTHROUGH STRATEGIES.

bce.INDICATORS: Creates a culture that emphasizes ongoing learning and development and reinforces its value to the organization.
bce.COMP_DEF: DEVELOPING PEOPLE TO MEET BOTH THEIR CAREER GOALS AND THE ORGANIZATION’S GOALS.

bce.INDICATORS: Anticipates and ensures the impact of emerging technologies and positions organization both structurally and culturally to best
bce.COMP_DEF: UNDERSTANDS THE POWER OF TECHNOLOGY TO DEMOCRATIZE, SCALE AND SPEED UP EVERY FORM OF INTERACTION AND ACTION.

bce.INDICATORS: Builds a culture across levels that challenges the organization to generate possibilities and implement breakthrough ideas and s
bce.COMP_DEF: CREATING NEW AND BETTER WAYS FOR THE ORGANIZATION TO BE SUCCESSFUL.

bce.INDICATORS: Sets smart goals, be accountable for performance
bce.COMP_DEF: CONSISTENTLY ACHIEVING RESULTS, EVEN UNDER CHALLENGING CIRCUMSTANCES AND OBSTACLES.

bce.INDICATORS: Gathers feedback from different sources to get an accurate picture of own effectiveness and make necessary improvements.
bce.COMP_DEF: USING FEEDBACK AND REFLECTION TO GAIN PRODUCTIVE INSIGHT INTO PERSONAL STRENGTHS AND WEAKNESSES AND DEVELOP NEW SKILLS.

bce.INDICATORS: Builds a culture within HMEL that promotes continuous improvement and quality outcomes by identifying and securing organizationa
bce.COMP_DEF: KNOWING THE MOST EFFECTIVE AND EFFICIENT PROCESSES TO GET THINGS DONE, WITH A FOCUS ON CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT.

bce.INDICATORS: sets and conveys clear objectives and provides resources to achieve long term organisational goals.
bce.COMP_DEF: PLANNING AND PRIORITIZING WORK TO MEET COMMITMENTS ALIGNED WITH ORGANIZATIONAL GOALS.
